title: Scientists Made An Artificial "Cloud" That Pulls Electricity From Air
excerpt: A new prototype compatible with a wide range of materials could grab a continuous supply of renewable energy from the air.

title: This startup wants to make nuclear energy huge by making its reactors tiny—
